mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (M_IDX, M_NAME, M_GENDER, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, M_PW, M_PHONE, M_JUMIN, M_TYPE, M_DEL_YN, M_REGDATE, M_QUE, M_ANS, M_PRIVATE, M_BAN_DATE) VALUES (M_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{M_NAME}, #{M_GENDER}, #{M_NICKNAME}, #{M_EMAIL},#{M_PW}, #{M_PHONE}, #{M_JUMIN}, default, default, SYSDATE, #{M_QUE}, #{M_ANS}, default, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE M_EMAIL = #{M_EMAIL} AND M_PW = #{M_PW} AND M_DEL_YN!='Y'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_NICKNAME=#{M_NICKNAME} AND M_DEL_YN!='Y'
SELECT M_PW FROM MEMBER WHERE M_EMAIL=#{M_EMAIL} AND M_DEL_YN!='Y'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_EMAIL=#{M_EMAIL} AND M_DEL_YN!='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET M_DEL_YN='Y', M_GENDER=0, M_NAME=' ', M_NICKNAME=' ', M_EMAIL=' ', M_PW=' ', M_PHONE=' ', M_JUMIN=' ', M_QUE=' ', M_ANS=' ' WHERE M_IDX=#{M_IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(AVG(RV_STAR),1) "STARFLOAT" FROM MOIM M, REVIEW R WHERE M.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND R.MO_IDX=M.MO_IDX
SELECT ROUND(AVG(RV_STAR)) "STARINT" FROM MOIM M, REVIEW R WHERE M.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND R.MO_IDX=M.MO_IDX
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOIM WHERE M_IDX=#{M_IDX}

SELECT M.*, SUBSTR(MO_TITLE,1,16) AS MOTT , F.F_SVNAME FROM MOIM M, FILE_T F WHERE M.M_IDX = #{M_IDX} AND M.MO_DEL_YN = 'N' AND F.F_TABLE (+) = 'M' AND F.F_ARTICLE (+) = M.MO_IDX AND F.F_MAIN_YN(+) = 'Y' AND F.F_DEL_YN(+) = 'N' ORDER BY M.MO_REGDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) "MOIMMEMBER" FROM PARTYMEM WHERE MO_IDX=#{MO_IDX} AND P_BAN_YN='N' AND P_FINAL_YN='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARTYMEM P, MOIM M WHERE P.M_IDX = #{M_IDX} AND P.P_BAN_YN = 'N' AND P.P_FINAL_YN = 'Y' AND P.MO_IDX = M.MO_IDX AND MO_DEL_YN = 'N' AND NOT M.M_IDX = P.M_IDX

SELECT SUBSTR(M.MO_TITLE,1,14) AS MOTT, M.MO_IDX, M.MO_DETAILREGION, M.MO_DETAILCATEGORY, NVL(M.MO_COST,0) AS MO_COST2, M.MO_MAXPEOPLE, MEM.M_PRIVATE, M.MO_IDX, M.MO_CATEGORY, M.MO_CLOSE_YN, F.F_SVNAME, M.M_IDX AS MOIDX, MEM.M_IDX AS MEMIDX FROM PARTYMEM P, MOIM M, MEMBER MEM, FILE_T F
WHERE P.M_IDX = MEM.M_IDX AND P.P_FINAL_YN = 'Y' AND P.P_BAN_YN = 'N' AND P.M_IDX = #{M_IDX} AND P.MO_IDX = M.MO_IDX AND F.F_TABLE(+) = 'M' AND F.F_ARTICLE(+) = M.MO_IDX AND F.F_DEL_YN(+) = 'N' AND F.F_MAIN_YN(+) = 'Y' AND NOT M.M_IDX = MEM.M_IDX
ORDER BY M.MO_REGDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS RVCOUNT FROM REVIEW R, MOIM M WHERE R.M_IDX = #{M_IDX} AND R.MO_IDX = #{MO_IDX} AND R.RV_DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOIM M, REVIEW R WHERE R.M_IDX = #{M_IDX} AND M.MO_IDX = R.MO_IDX AND M.MO_IDX = P.MO_IDX AND R.RV_DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOIM M, REVIEW R WHERE M.M_IDX = #{M_IDX} AND M.MO_IDX = R.MO_IDX AND R.RV_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT SUBSTR(M.MO_TITLE,1,11) AS MO_TITLE, M.*, R.*, F.* FROM MOIM M, REVIEW R, FILE_T F WHERE R.M_IDX = #{M_IDX} AND M.MO_IDX = R.MO_IDX AND R.RV_DEL_YN = 'N' AND F_DEL_YN(+) = 'N' AND F.F_ARTICLE(+) = R.RV_IDX AND F.F_MAIN_YN(+) = 'Y' AND F.F_TABLE(+) = 'R' ORDER BY R.RV_REGDATE DESC
SELECT SUBSTR(M.MO_TITLE,1,11) AS MO_TITLE, M.*, R.* FROM MOIM M, REVIEW R WHERE M.M_IDX = #{M_IDX} AND M.MO_IDX = R.MO_IDX AND R.RV_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY R.RV_REGDATE DESC

SELECT Z.Z_IDX, Z.M_IDX, Z.Z_ARTICLE, Z.Z_TABLE,Z.Z_DEL_YN, FR.FR_IDX, FR.FR_TITLE, FR.FR_CATEGORY, FR.FR_REGDATE, FR.FR_WRITER, FR.FR_COUNT, M.M_PRIVATE, NVL(F.F_SVNAME,0) AS PROFILE FROM ZZIM Z, FREE FR, MEMBER M, FILE_T F WHERE Z.M_IDX= #{M_IDX} AND Z.Z_TABLE='F' AND Z.Z_ARTICLE= FR.FR_IDX AND Z.M_IDX = M.M_IDX AND F.F_ARTICLE (+) = FR.M_IDX AND F.F_TABLE(+) = 'P' AND Z.Z_DEL_YN='N'
SELECT F.F_SVNAME AS FREEIMG, Z.Z_IDX FROM FILE_T F, ZZIM Z WHERE F.F_ARTICLE = Z.Z_ARTICLE AND Z.M_IDX=#{M_IDX}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZZIM Z, MOIM M WHERE Z.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND Z.Z_TABLE='M' AND Z.Z_ARTICLE=M.MO_IDX
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZZIM Z, FREE F WHERE Z.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND Z.Z_TABLE='F' AND Z.Z_ARTICLE=F.FR_IDX ORDER BY F.FR_REGDATE DESC

SELECT Z.Z_IDX, Z.M_IDX, Z.Z_ARTICLE, Z.Z_TABLE, M.MO_IDX, M.MO_TITLE, M.MO_DETAILCATEGORY, M.MO_DETAILREGION, M.MO_COST, MEM.M_PRIVATE, M.MO_MAXPEOPLE, M.MO_CATEGORY, Z.Z_DEL_YN, F.F_SVNAME FROM ZZIM Z, MOIM M, MEMBER MEM, FILE_T F WHERE Z.M_IDX= #{M_IDX} AND Z.Z_TABLE ='M' AND Z.Z_ARTICLE = M.MO_IDX AND Z.M_IDX=MEM.M_IDX AND Z.Z_DEL_YN='N' AND F_TABLE(+) = 'M' AND F_ARTICLE(+) = M.MO_IDX AND F.F_MAIN_YN(+) ='Y' ORDER BY M.MO_REGDATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET M_PRIVATE=#{M_PRIVATE} WHERE M_IDX=#{M_IDX}
UPDATE MEMBER SET M_DEL_YN='S', M_BAN_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE M_IDX=#{M_IDX}
UPDATE MEMBER SET M_DEL_YN='N', M_BAN_DATE=NULL WHERE M_IDX=#{M_IDX}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (R_IDX, R_MEM, R_REASON, R_REPORTEDMEM, R_COUNT, R_DATE, R_DETAIL, R_DEL_YN) VALUES (R_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{R_MEM}, #{R_REASON}, #{R_REPORTEDMEM}, 1, SYSDATE, #{R_DETAIL}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FILE_T WHERE F_TABLE='P' AND F_ARTICLE=#{F_ARTICLE} AND F_MAIN_YN='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILE_T(F_IDX, F_TABLE, F_ARTICLE, F_OGNAME, F_SVNAME, F_SIZE, F_MAIN_YN, F_DEL_YN, F_REG_DATE) VALUES (F_IDX.NEXTVAL, 'P', #{F_ARTICLE}, #{F_OGNAME}, #{F_SVNAME}, #{F_SIZE}, 'Y', 'N', SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE FILE_T SET F_OGNAME=#{F_OGNAME}, F_SVNAME=#{F_SVNAME}, F_SIZE=#{F_SIZE}, F_REG_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE F_ARTICLE=#{M_IDX} AND F_TABLE='P' AND F_MAIN_YN='Y'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE M_NICKNAME=#{M_NICKNAME}

mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY M.M_REGDATE DESC) RNUM, M.M_IDX, M.M_NAME, M.M_EMAIL, M.M_REGDATE, M.M_NICKNAME, M.M_DEL_YN, M.M_BAN_DATE, COUNT(R_IDX) AS RECOUNT FROM MEMBER M, REPORT R WHERE R.R_REPORTEDMEM(+) = M.M_IDX AND M.M_DEL_YN!='Y' AND R.R_DEL_YN(+)!='Y' AND M.M_TYPE!='A' GROUP BY M.M_IDX, M.M_NAME, M.M_EMAIL, M.M_REGDATE, M.M_NICKNAME, M.M_DEL_YN, M.M_BAN_DATE

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(R_IDX) DESC) RNUM, M.M_IDX, M.M_NAME, M.M_EMAIL, M.M_REGDATE, M.M_NICKNAME, M.M_DEL_YN, M.M_BAN_DATE, COUNT(R_IDX) AS RECOUNT FROM MEMBER M, REPORT R WHERE R.R_REPORTEDMEM(+) = M.M_IDX AND M.M_DEL_YN='N' AND R.R_DEL_YN='N' AND M.M_TYPE!='A' GROUP BY M.M_IDX, M.M_NAME, M.M_EMAIL, M.M_REGDATE, M.M_NICKNAME, M.M_DEL_YN, M.M_BAN_DATE

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY M.M_BAN_DATE DESC) RNUM, M.M_IDX, M.M_NAME, M.M_EMAIL, M.M_REGDATE, M.M_NICKNAME, M.M_DEL_YN, M.M_BAN_DATE, COUNT(R_IDX) AS RECOUNT FROM MEMBER M, REPORT R WHERE R.R_REPORTEDMEM(+) = M.M_IDX AND M.M_DEL_YN='S' AND M.M_TYPE!='A' AND R.R_DEL_YN(+)!='Y' GROUP BY M.M_IDX, M.M_NAME, M.M_EMAIL, M.M_REGDATE, M.M_NICKNAME, M.M_DEL_YN, M.M_BAN_DATE
SELECT MEMBER.*, F_SVNAME FROM MEMBER, FILE_T WHERE M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND F_TABLE='P' AND F_ARTICLE=M_IDX
SELECT R.* FROM MEMBER M, REPORT R WHERE M.M_IDX=R.R_REPORTEDMEM AND M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND R.R_DEL_YN='N'

UPDATE ZZIM SET Z_DEL_YN='N' WHERE Z_IDX = #{Z_IDX}
